heroSection.heading:
Game Engine,
Game Changer
heroSection.description: Create your 2D and 3D games, cross-platform projects, or explore innovative ideas in XR technology with Redot Engine!

productShowcaseSection.title:
Powering Your
Game Development
productShowcaseSection.description: Unlock endless possibilities with our flexible and high-performance game engine for every creator.

textRevealSection.body: The Redot Engine is an innovative game engine that brings your imagination to life. Create precise and interactive games with unparalleled freedom!

featuresSection.title:
Redot Engine's
Powerful Features
featuresSection.description: Discover cutting-edge tools and capabilities designed to bring your game ideas to life effortlessly.

sceneDrivenDesign.description: Create reusable scenes with nodes, scripts, and clear game logic via node hierarchy.

crossPlatform.description: Develop on various platforms. Deploy your game on desktop, mobile, and web quickly.

2D3DEngines.description: Create performant 2D games with Redot's 2D engine and build rich 3D worlds easily.

openSource.description: Experience open development with Redot Engine, where all contributors share equally.

reviewSection.title: What our users say
reviewSection.description: Redot Engine empowers developers with flexibility and performance for creating amazing games.

blogSection.title: Latest Blog Posts
blogSection.description: Stay updated with the latest news, tutorials, and insights from the Redot community.

startSection.title: Ready to create?
startSection.description: Create captivating 2D and 3D games with Redot Engine for cross-platform immersive experiences.

downloadHero.title: Ignite Your Imagination
downloadHero.description: Download Redot Engine, the powerful platform for building 2D and 3D cross-platform games and interactive experiences.

downloadDialog.title: Select Download Version
downloadDialog.description: Choose the version that best suits your needs.

archive.name: Archive
archive.note: Note: Archived versions may lack the latest features and security updates.

downloadThreeSteps.title: Create with Redot
downloadThreeSteps.description: Build your game easily with Redot Engine - fast, flexible, and open-source for all developers.

step1.title: 1. Choose Your Redot Version
step1.description: You can choose the latest Redot Engine, an older release, or try a beta version.

step2.title: 2. Download Redot Engine
step2.description: Follow the instructions to complete installation and setup.

step3.title: 3. Start Your Project
step3.description: Start your project from scratch or choose a template. Join our Discord community to connect!

downloadSupportedPlatform.title: Supported platforms
downloadSupportedPlatform.description: Redot Engine runs smoothly on various platforms, ensuring compatibility.

systemRequirements.title: Redot Engine System Requirements
systemRequirements.description: Recommended: Vulkan 1.0 compatible hardware. Minimal: OpenGL 3.3 / OpenGL ES 3.0 compatible hardware. Additional requirements for the .NET version:

about.title: What is Redot Engine?
about.description: Redot Engine is a free, open-source platform for 2D and 3D game development, based on Godot, offering flexibility, ease of use, and cross-platform support.

downloadHelp.title: Need Help?
downloadHelp.description: Join our Discord server to get help, share ideas, and connect with our community!

noPostsFound.title: Article Not Found
noPostsFound.description: The article you are looking for could not be found.

articleNotFound.title: Article Not Found
articleNotFound.description: The article you are looking for could not be found.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: We'd love to hear from you! Reach out with your questions, feedback, or collaboration ideas.

faq.redotExplanation: Redot is a fork of Godot focused on improving the stability and performance of the engine.
faq.redotMadeExplanation: Redot was created to address specific needs that some developers felt were not fully met by Godot in terms of engine handling and the game development community.
faq.antiWoke: Is Redot an anti-woke project or server?
faq.antiWokeExplanation: No. Redot is focused on game development. We want to create a community for all game developers, regardless of their political ideologies.
faq.platformsExplanation:
Redot 4.3 is available on Windows, Linux, and macOS.
Redot 4.4 is available on Windows, Linux, and Android.
faq.transferFromGodot: Can I transfer my project from Godot to Redot?
faq.transferExplanation: The current Redot builds were forked from Godot 4.3 and 4.4, so if your project works with either of those, you'll be able to transfer it to Redot.

licenses.title: Licenses
licenses.description: Redot Engine uses open-source libraries and fonts, each with its own licence, listed on this page.

community.title: Community
community.description: Redot Engine boasts a vibrant community where developers exchange ideas.

underConstruction.description: We're working hard behind the scenes. Maybe even more than the coffee machine!
